import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { DateContext } from "../../context/DateContext"; import TicketOverview from "../../components/ticketOverview"; import { useBook } from "../../context/BookContext"; // import ProgressBar from "../../components/ProgressBar"; export default function BookingDetails () { const [ticket, setTicket] = useState(0); const increaseTicket = () => setTicket((ticket) => ticket + 1); const decreaseTicket = () => setTicket((ticket) => (ticket > 0 ? ticket - 1 : 0)); const {ticketItems} = useBook(); useEffect (()=> { localStorage.setItem("ticketItem",JSON.stringify(ticketItems)); },[ticketItems]) return( <>
